message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you a chance to purchase this product.  I think it would be incredibly valuable to you. Given its potential, I'm offering it at a price of $11,000.
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. I'm willing to pay a bit more, but I need to stay within my budget.
I understand your budget concerns, Bob, but $9,500 is significantly below its true value.  I could meet you halfway at $10,250. This is my final offer.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'd like to offer $9,800 for the product. I'm willing to make a compromise, but I need to stay within my budget.
